# Sunder Breaker (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D) or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless) and see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless) and see text

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 195

You place an invisible ward upon the target. The next time a creature succeeds at a sunder combat maneuver against the target, the attackerâ€™s weapon takes 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d6). If the attacker used a natural weapon for the sunder, the attacker takes half this damage. Spell resistance applies to this damage. The attacker can attempt a Fortitude save to halve this damage.

The ward on the target counts as a magical trap and can be detected and disabled as such.
